places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Heritage Plaza
address: Thalayazham, Vaikom - Vechoor Rd, Vaikom, Thalayazham, Kerala 686613, India

reviews.text: The hotel staff's attitude is incredibly disappointing and non-cooperative. If you're considering hosting an event here, beware of their lackadaisical approach. The management and other employees display a blatant disregard for customer satisfaction. It's evident they couldn't care less about losing patrons. Regrettably, this seems to be a recurring issue, as evidenced by similar complaints in numerous Google reviews.

Very clean throughout, with luxury rooms of a high standard. Peaceful surroundings. About 4km from Vaikom town and beach but easy with autorickshaw. Well maintained hotel. Restaurant was closed for an inspection. Staff need a bit more training regarding client facing skills.

Location is easy accessible.
Pricing is just fair.
Attitude of staff needs improvement.
Taste of food is the same with normal restaurants. With better hygiene.
Have good parking facilities.
Night lighting and arrangements are good.
Rooms are not so advanced, has facilities of only 2 star or below.

I've stayed in many 5 star and 4 star hotels in Kerala. There's a manager in heritage plaza . He thinks it is the only good hotel in kerala. The well maintained aesthetic beauty of the property is just ruined by his horrific attitude to customers. We pay for the service not for his attitude. The management must rethink about having such a bad mannered staff.

Stopped in at this place around 5:00pm today for tea and snacks, walked into an empty restaurant with no one attending, sat there for some time before a gentleman walks in speaking on the phone and walks out, the same chap still on the phone gives us the menue and walks out again, felt like they are doing me a favour. Left the place immediately and drove into a small tea shack down the road, it was a much better experience there and friendly folks having tea there.

places_with_reviews.name: KTDC Kumarakom Gateway
address: Thanneermukkom, Cherthala, Alappuzha, Thanneermukkom, Kerala 688527, India

reviews.text: We visited this place last week, It has a very good ambience and a good location with a great view  next to the Vembanad Lake, extraordinary sunrise views.The resort Staff were very hospitable. Food at the resort was good. Overall a Wonderful experience.

Great location with a great view, quiet and serene for family vacation, staycation, The resort Staff were very hospitable. They were helpful with local eat outs recommendation. Food at the resort was good, homely and fresh. Overall had a happy stay. Cleanliness in rooms could be improved. Would like to return again.

We loved our stay at this KTDC resort. The food was exceptional!! The resort is right next to the Vembanad Lake, so you get quite extraordinary sunrise views.

The views come at a cost as this resort is a 40 minute drive away from Alleppey town area.

All the staff are helpful.

I just wish that KTDC would get more funds to maintain the rooms!

Our stay was pleasant, so would recommend!

We had our  engineering batch re union this weekend .Glad to share a wonderful and superb feedback on the arrangements provided  by the team there. They were always supportive and made sure for us to have a wonderful stay. The food was really awesome too..

Good service and a great location. There is a lot of potential to make it a great spot, but a lot needs to be done. There is no pool, which makes it tough for families to entertain themselves.

Food is good but nothing special about it.

places_with_reviews.name: Lake vechoor villas Resort
address: Ambika Market near Kumarakom, Vechoor, Kottayam, Kerala 686144, India

reviews.text: I have been in relationships with this property  last three year's. My guests enjoys each and every day with stayed at lake vechoor villas. Best location for viewing  sun set.nice rooms and restaurant with Kerala food  .Nice to stay

Best villa to stay and enjoy your day with backwaters and  sun set and sun rise, ponds for fishing and natural  background, old Kerala traditional with modern amenities. If someone want to see Kerala must visit lakevechoorvillas. Best place to be in a peaceful and  Kerala stye.

Pleasant experience with nice hospitality in kerala style  villas with nice food to eat with kerala  traditions. Best place to enjoy fishing and  fruits  to eat like banana,coconut and more. Friendly staff with honesty and noble.i recommended for all the people who have been in kerala.

Best location and best place to see sun set.nice staff and prompt response and services , good food great Room and affordable prices.i suggest a complete travel solution for Kerala visit. Would love to come again.
Kerala is the best place to visit and see,but. Lake vechoor villas is most welcome place to visit and enjoy natural Beauty with backwaters. Recommended to everyone who is interested in Kerala .
Excellent ambiance and good services
Good place
Love thise please
Nice

A great vegetarian restaurant located very close to the west gate of Vaikom Mahadeva Temple. They offer delicious Dosa, Idli, crispy vadas, puttu, and poori for breakfast. The Poori masala has a delightful taste. The food is flavorsome, and the staff is well-behaved, providing excellent service.

A veg restaurant which started decades ago and is a no-nonsense place even this day. Ghee dosa, banana fry, vada and coffee were all yummy. Well behaved staff and the place wasn’t crowded on a late Saturday afternoon. Highly recommend for vegetarian dishes near to the Mahadeva temple.
Oldest vegetarian hotel in vaikom,situated near to vaikom mahadeva temple
Good vegetarian restaurant,affordable and very close to the temple

One of the oldest and best vegetarian hotel in Vaikom.  Situated near Vaikom Mahadeva temple.  We will get testy dosa,idlis puttu etc. Meals tastes just awesome in a very low price.  For evening we can have Vadas with chutney, banana fry etc. Coffee,tea,black tea and black coffee are available.. Average sitting capacity.. Very polite staffs and good&hygienic atmosphere..

places_with_reviews.name: Das Brothers HOTEL & TEA SHOP
address: PC59+3FF, Vaikom - Vechoor Rd, Thalayazham, Kerala 686607, India
